features: Perfect Quality: The silky pillowcase uses 100% polyester satin which is a kind of smooth and silky fabric and satin is just a special weave. Meanwhile the pillow cover is more durable than silk satin pillowcase.
Nurture Hair: Satin pillowcase can protect you and family hair from tugs and knotting. Frizzy mess will be gone in the morning!
Beauty Your Skin: The slip satin pillowcase for skin can clear the disorder that stop you becoming a great beauty because of its soft and silky material especially your face is allergic or has acne.
Distinctive Envelope Design: The envelope closure design of silk pillowcase for hair and skin will give a full protection to your pillow and no zipper won't snag your hair.
Easy To Wash: The pillowcase is machine washable. Simply machine wash on a gentle cycle separately with cold water. Line dry or tumble dry low.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for skin and hair!!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this celestial satin pillowcase and have been thoroughly impressed with its quality and benefits. The first thing that caught my eye was the striking design, featuring a beautiful celestial pattern that adds a touch of elegance and charm to my bedroom decor.After washing it, I noticed that the pillowcase retained its softness, which is a testament to its high-quality material. This softness is not just a luxury to the touch, but it also plays a practical role, especially for someone like me with curly hair. The smooth satin surface has significantly reduced hair frizz and tangling, making my morning hair routine much more manageable.Furthermore, this pillowcase has been a blessing for my skin. Unlike other materials that can absorb moisture and oils from the skin, the satin fabric of this pillowcase helps in maintaining hydration, leaving my skin feeling fresh and less prone to breakouts and dryness.Overall, I would rate the celestial satin pillowcase a solid 10/10. It’s not just a visually appealing bedroom accessory, but it also offers tangible benefits for hair and skin health, making it a worthwhile investment for anyone seeking comfort and style in their sleeping environment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These pillow cases are a great buy. The satin is very soft, not itchy or smelly at all. I have sensitive skin and wear box braids year-round; I’ve used these pillow cases for a week straight now and neither my skin nor my hair has had any adverse reactions or outbreaks. The pattern is whimsical and vibrant, it gives off strong “whimsigoth” vibes lol (see attached photo). And they’re pretty big too, I can easily fit 2 small pillows inside each pillow case with room to spare. Definitely worth the buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Acne? Frizzy Hair? Skincare?
reviews.reviewText: These pillowcases are extremely smooth and soft to the touch. It is a MAJOR upgrade from the common pillowcases that everyone has. Now, if you're interested in these silk pillowcases because of the theory that they will help clear your skin from acne, I was too. Unfortunately, I don't think that these pillowcases directly affected my acne in any way, but then again it is different for every person so maybe give it a shot! Worst-case scenario, you'll end up with the comfiest pillow case you've ever had. I did however notice that my night skincare didn't get absorbed into the pillowcases as it would've been with cotton ones. This is one of the main reasons why I love these pillowcases, they let your skincare stay on your face! These pillowcases are durable unless you are purposefully stretching them to their limits, and the colors are beautiful, especially the blue that I got!!! I will definitely be buying more pairs so that I don't have to use *cough* cotton *cough* pillowcases while my silk ones are washing. For its price, it's a wonderful thing to buy and I 100% recommend these!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute, comfortable, snag easy
reviews.reviewText: These got snags in them after only one night, but luckily, they did not continue unraveling. It's been two months now, and aside from the snags, these pillowcases are very comfortable and wrinkle-free. They also help keep my hair smooth and my face from breaking out. They would deserve five stars if they didn't snag so easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my wife and she is very happy with the smooth softness of the fabric. The pattern is really nice, too. Looks to be of good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised when I received these pillowcases as they were/are everything that they should be! They are extremely, extremely soft and silky. They don’t have any blemishes, snags, tears, or the dreaded “permanent imprints” that this type of fabric is so prone to getting and that seems to happen so easily and readily. The stitching along the seams is straight, durable/thick/secure. The pillowcases also don’t get as wrinkled, if really honestly wrinkled at all, also like silk fabrics can get (I know that a portion of the other reviewers stated that theirs had issues with wrinkling, this was definitely not the case with me.), and that’s the case for me with no special precautions or measure that I did to prevent them from wrinkling: just a normal wash cycle with laundry detergent and fabric softener, and then throw into the dryer on the bedding setting (with the rest of my dark colored bedding), so on a high dryer heat setting. The color (navy blue) of the pillowcases is as expected: deep, rich, and even throughout. Nor is there any bleeding of the color of the pillowcases onto my bedding or onto my pajamas, even when I’ve had the occasional hot night, with mild night sweats. While the silk fabric is not cooling at all, it also isn’t as hot as some silk, and silk bedding products can be. The overall size of the pillowcases in relation to the standard or usual pillow sizes (Standard/Queen Sized, or King Sized) is that they are slightly larger than they should be (which is the only slight negative that I can find with this product), but hey, at least there won’t be any issues with my pillows hanging out of the pillowcases, my pillows constantly “peaking out” of the pillowcase, or me having to royally shove my pillow into the case each time I change my bedding or make my bed because they barely fit into the pillowcase.Definitely worth the money! An amazing deal abs value and just an overall great buy! I’ll probably buy another set for my bed just for when I’m washing my bedding, so I’ll have another set that I can use, rotating them out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought as a gift for someone else, arrived in a folder-like mailing sleeve and was heavily wrinkled out of packaging. I heard from the recipient that it's been very comfortable to sleep with these pillowcases and she's noticed less hair breakage and frizz in the mornings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So soft and after the first wash, it was still intact and great condition
La calidad es decente pero el estampado no es tan brillante como en las fotos

reviews.reviewTitle: Luxurious Comfort for a Restful Night
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using the EXQ Home Satin Pillowcases for a few weeks now, and they’ve significantly improved my sleep quality. The satin material is not only luxurious to the touch but also beneficial for my hair and skin. I’ve noticed less hair breakage and fewer skin irritations since making the switch.The silver grey color is elegant and has held up well in the wash, maintaining its sheen and color. The envelope closure is a thoughtful design, eliminating the discomfort of zippers.These pillowcases are surprisingly cooling, providing comfort during warmer nights. They’re a great combination of style, comfort, and functionality. Highly recommended for anyone looking to add a touch of luxury to their bedding.

Ok. Let’s talkAbout the elephant in the room. I’m menopausal and break out into hotLava in a blink among other things. Nothing worse than a hot pillow! I find they keep their cool and so soft and silky feeling. Even though your a hot mess, knowing your head is resting on this silky soft material somehow makes it all better. And if your feeling it’s getting warm just flip the pillow and the other side is so nice and cool. Just lovely! And if you doManage not to break out into a hot flash during the night it actually helps your hair not looking so rooster like in the morning. Washed well and best part it does not show sweat marks or droolStains as bad as other pillow cases! Bonus!
